McMd::DihedralPotential Class Reference
Dihedral Potentials

Detailed Description

Interface for a Dihedral Potential.

const Vector &  R2,
const Vector &  R3,
int  type 
) const [pure virtual]

Returns potential energy for one dihedral.

1 3 4 o o----o \ / o 2

Parameters:
R1bond vector from atom 1 to 2.
R2bond vector from atom 2 to 3.
R3bond vector from atom 3 to 4.
typetype of dihedral.
